title: THE TRACTOR ATTACHMENT EVERYONE WAS ASKING FOR!

tasks.task: Operate video camera while showing a 48-inch tiller.
subtasks: Adjust camera angle to show the tiller model.
Pan camera to display the tiller's features.
Interview narrator to confirm availability and specifications.
Perform a demonstration of the tiller's operation (imaginary).
Mention target tractor models for the tiller.
Provide website for ordering the tiller.

tasks.task: Operate videoblogue about agricultural equipment.
subtasks: Explain timing and past customer inquiries.
Engage audience through social media interaction.

tasks.task: Operate video camera while showing a 48-inch tiller. For that, subtasks would include adjusting the camera angle to highlight the product, maybe panning the camera to show different features. Also, they probably interviewed the narrator, so confirming availability and specs would be part of that.
